rukus.text: Tapeugot miseu dua droe sahbat Uleh Hadharat meunan Neupeugah i r Nyang sidroe kaya na keubon ‘inab Anggor that mangat jitanom luah s Ngon bak kuruma sinan pih le that Laen lom meuhat tanaman indah
Bandua lampoh boh kayee le that 2 Rasajih lazat mangat sileupah Hana nyang rusak taeu meu sapat Te krueng pih jroh that ile di bawah
Jieu boh kayee dum lazat-lazat : Ureueng nyan ligat meunoe jipeugah \ Jikheun bak rakan ulon kaya that Meunan lom pangkat raya sileupah
‘Oh Iheuh jikheun nyan jitamong ligat i Keubon nyang jroh that jak kalon pantah y Jikhem le teuma keubonlon meuhat Barangjan meuhat han le meuubah
Hana teujalok di lon meu siat Uroe kiamat dudoe geupeugah Meunyo cit lonwoe ubak Hadharat Teuntee mangat that leubeh lom indah

Jaweub le rakan geubri nasehat Pakon roh sisat gata ka salah 1 Pakon takaphe akan Hadharat Tuhanku nyang that kuasa leupah d Tuhan nyang peujeuet gata hai sahbat Bak tauoh batat sinan Neuulah Bak ie sititek Neupeujeuet ligat d ‘Oh rayok meuhat agam nyang gagah
Teutapi di lon wahe e sahbat Tuhan Hadharat di lon keu Allah Han sagai di lon lonpeucharikat Tuhan Hadharat hana lon bantah

Pakon han takheun meunoe hai sahbat Watee talihat keubon jroh leupah Tuhan nyang kheundak peujeuet nyoe meuhat Hana nyang kuat meunyo kon Allah Bah le takalon lonnyoe gasien that Harta tan sapat Neubri le Allah Aneuk pi di lon hana siurat Di gata meuhat sit le that leupah

Teutapi Tuhan kuasa that-that : Deungon sikeujap pih ek Neuubah £ Ek Neubri keu lon keubon nyang jroh that Leubeh bak hajat gata nyang mewah Lam keubon gata Neupeutron laknat Geulanteue kilat Neubri le Allah Abeh dum jitak kurma ngon ‘inab Bandum ka seungap anco ngon bicah Tanoh nyang geumbok bandum jeuet batat
Bala raya that Neubri le Allah Je krueng teuh pih tho han le tatupat Jitron u pusat dalam tanoh crah

Lheuhnyan teukeudi nibak Hadharat Anco han meupat keubon nyang indah Han le boh kayee nyang lazat-lazat Yohnyan teulah that rugoe- sileupah Padumna rugoe beulanja le that Abeh riwayat bandum ka sudah Watee nyan jikheun ulon teulah that Keu peue Hadharat lonkheun le leupah Adak kon Tuhan lon peucharikat Teuntee lon meuhat han meunoe sudah
Han le soe tulong jinoe jih meuhat Han troh barangpat keunan kaphilah Rugoe ngon payah hana soe lihat Meu kon Hadharat nyang bri peurintah
Sinan keuh nyata Tuhan beunar that Nyang jroh akibat pahla bak Allah
